mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{newPassword}, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_rank FROM ( SELECT user, SUM(total_amount) AS total_consumption, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(total_amount) DESC) AS user_rank FROM orders WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY user ) AS ranked_users WHERE user = #{userId}
SELECT MAX(user_total) FROM ( SELECT user, SUM(total_amount) AS user_total FROM orders WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY user ) AS user_totals
SELECT AVG(user_total) FROM ( SELECT user, SUM(total_amount) AS user_total FROM orders WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY user ) AS user_totals
SELECT COUNT(o.order_id) AS orderCount, SUM(o.total_amount) AS totalAmount FROM orders o WHERE o.user = #{userId} AND o.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT c.name AS category, SUM(oi.price * oi.quantity) AS amount FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE o.user = #{userId} AND o.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY c.category_id, c.name
